titles.title: Counter-UAS Authority Extension Act
A bill to extend the authority for the protection of certain facilities and assets from unmanned aircraft.
Counter-UAS Authority Extension Act

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time. (Legislative Day October 21, 2025).

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 206.
